translations: 糖果，蜜饯；调制；糖膏（剂）；精制工艺品

sentences.sentence: Read our past coverage about the health benefits of the confection.
sentences.translation: 读一下我们以前的关于蜜饯对人体健康的好处的文章。

sentences.sentence: This caramel confection hides an unhealthy dose of sugar and an unnecessary amount of calories.
sentences.translation: 这样的焦糖与拿铁的结合含有超出健康范围的糖分和人体非必需的卡路里。

sentences.sentence: They were given private lessons on how to make the delicious confection and took home 3kg each.
sentences.translation: 她们在如何做出美味的甜食方面受到了私人指导，还各带了3kg的份量回家。
